## EXERCICE 

### QUESTION 1

```{r}

library(data.table)
library(dslabs)
data(murders)
murders <- setDT(murders)
```



```{r}
murders <- murders[, rate := (total/population)*100000]
murders
```


### QUESTION 2

```{r}
murders <- murders[, rank := rank(-rate)]
murders
```

### QUESTION 3

```{r}
murders[, .(state, abb)]

```

### QUESTION 4

```{r}

murders[rank %in% 1:5]

```

### QUESTION 5

```{r}
no_south <- murders[region != "South"]
nrow(no_south)
```

### QUESTION 6

```{r}
murders_nw <- murders[region %in% c("Northeast", "West")]
nrow(murders_nw)
```

### QUESTION 7

```{r}

my_states <- murders_nw[rate < 1, .(state, rate, rank)]
my_states
```
